sentence: So while we're still stuck with them, I like to think that they both lost in this situation,? Beard added, which makes me happy.? Nir reminded the audience that Cawthorn is being investigated over his involvement in the Jan. 6 insurrection: We also shouldn't forget about the fact that there is still a pending challenge to Madison Cawthorn's eligibility to even appear on the ballot because of his involvement around the Jan. 6 insurrection and invasion of the Capitol.
title: Highlights from The Downballot: A Texas primary preview with Jeff Singer
